newspaper.intro: Our state-of-the-art facial recognition system can identify registered users in seconds with remarkable accuracy. The system works by comparing facial features to those stored in our secure database.
newspaper.technology: The technology uses over 100 facial landmarks to create a unique digital signature of each face, making it highly accurate even under varying lighting conditions or when facial accessories are worn.
newspaper.accuracy: In recent tests, our system demonstrated a 99.7% accuracy rate, with near-instant recognition times averaging less than 200 milliseconds per identification.

multiCaptureHint: Multiple angle captures improve recognition accuracy. Click submit to process all captures.
